abstract.text: A sample that stores a vision prescription.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: Use this class to create an image-only prescription. Here, you attach the prescription as an image or PDF to a simple sample. The sample contains only basic information about the prescription, such as the issue and expiration dates. To see the prescription data, people must view the attached image or PDF.
Some regions may require an image of the original prescription to validate the prescription record.
To create an image-only prescription, start by creating an

code: // Create a minimal prescription sample that just holds an image attachment.

inlineContent.text: Next, save the sample to the HealthKit store.

code: // Save the sample to the HealthKit store.
fatalError("*** An error occurred while saving the prescription sample to the HealthKit store \(error.localizedDescription) ***")

inlineContent.text: Then, you can attach the image or PDF to the sample.

code: // Attach the image to the sample.
fatalError("*** An error occurred while attaching the image: \(error.localizedDescription) ***")
